label: ProductionProcess
comment: A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.

datatypeProperties.comment: A note providing additional information for this supply chain trade line item.
A machine allocated to this production process.
A production device allocated to this production process.
A specified assessment applicable to this referenced standard.
A specified declaration applicable to this production process.
A fault applicable to this trade product.
A specified licence applicable to this production process.
A parameter applicable to this specified method.
A specified production cycle applicable to this production process.
A certificate applicable to this product batch.
A chemical treatment applied during this production process.
A crop protection treatment applied during this production process.
A product finishing treatment applied during this production process.
A referenced standard associated to this specified licence.
The indication of whether or not this production process is critical.
A code specifying a disclosure level for this production process.
The indication of whether or not this production process is a final one.
An input batch applicable to this production machine.
Input material applicable to this facility production unit.
An input product applicable to this facility production unit.
The code specifying the inventory type for this production process.
An occurrence of an event for this production process.
The code specifying the operation reference for this production process.
The code specifying the operation technology for this production process.
An output batch applicable to this specified production device.
Output material applicable to this facility production unit.
An output product applicable to this facility production unit.
A work item performed for this production process.
Disposal instructions for the waste resulting from this production process.
The indication of whether or not this is a recycling production process.
A binary file related to this production process.
Production waste material reported for this agricultural crop production process.
A specification document referenced for this production process.
A sustainability assertion for this specified certification.
A referenced document for this specified inspection.
A production facility specified for this production process.
An organizational certification specified for this production facility.
A process certification specified for this production facility.
A product batch certification specified for this production facility.
A trade product certification specified for this production facility.
The code specifying the step in this production process.
A subcontractor for this trade party.
A subordinate process of this production process.
The code specifying the subordinate type for this production device.

referencedBy.comment: A process applicable to this specified production cycle.
A production process provided by this trade party.
A production process specified for this product batch.
A subordinate process of this production process.
